sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STARITZA, a town of Russia, in the province of Mos cow and government of Twer. It is the capital of a circle of the same name, containing seventy-seven parishes, with 83,800 inhabitants. It is 378 miles from Petersburg, and stands on the river Wolga, where the river Staritza joins that stream. It contains six churches, 650 houses, and 3860 in habitants, whose chief trade is in hemp sent to Petersburg, and in making shoes and gloves. Lat.56.48. Long. 35.22. E.
